original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar had an officer whose name was Nebuzaradan. He was the captain of the king's royal guards. Nebuzaradan came to Jerusalem when Nebuchadnezzar had ruled Babylon for 19 years. It was on the tenth day of the fifth month.
korean_text: 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 열아홉째 해 다섯째 달 열째 날에 바벨론 왕의 어전 사령관 느부사라단이 예루살렘에 이르러

sentences.original_text: He was the captain of the king's royal guards
when Nebuchadnezzar had ruled Babylon for 19 years
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살이 바빌론을 다스린 지 19년째 되었을 때입니다

sentences.original_text: It was on the tenth day of the fifth month
